channel.title: Moparscape Server status HELP!
channel.description:
Hi there mopar! I got a problem, when i want to post my server at the server status page i keep getting the error: This server has already been posted, but not yet approved, have some patience!.
but i made the account what they said and also waited alot of hours :P around 30hrs.. and my page not yet online? What happend and what can i do ?
- Deluxe

item.title: Moparscape Server status HELP!
item.dc:creator: @lost_forever lost forever
item.description:
@lost_forever wrote:

[quote=“i am banks, post:10, topic:529173”]I get the same error!

!!Error:
This server has already been posted, but not yet approved, have some patience!.[/quote]
Did you not read anything mentioned in the thread?

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape Server status HELP!
item.dc:creator: @zeldanoob zeldanoob
item.description:
@zeldanoob wrote:

Si Force:

Just an update; the server status page should be fixed at some stage tonight. Sorry for any inconvenience!

Thanks, ill get some sleep, and check out next mornning

  • thansk agian !

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape Server status HELP!
item.dc:creator: @zeldanoob zeldanoob
item.description:
@zeldanoob wrote:

Ruby:

The meeting is in an hour and 15 minutes, I’ll ask him to post here when he’s free.

Alright, ill stay online then

  • thanks

item.title: Moparscape Server status HELP!
item.dc:creator: @zeldanoob zeldanoob
item.description:
@zeldanoob wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:4, topic:529173”][quote author=zeldanoob link=topic=647930.msg4357946#msg4357946 date=1378066356]

This has not been officially confirmed, but we suspect that there is a problem with the server status page at the moment. Many members have been reporting that they have not been able to add their server to the SSP. If there is an issue, hopefully it’ll be fixed ASAP.

Aaah … okiii is there any estimated time ?
[/quote]
There’s a staff meeting tonight where moparisthebest will be present, I’m sure he’ll take a look then.[/quote]

Sounds good, can you maybe somehow keep me up-to-date, so i can add my server to the page, im in need of more players hehe
thanks for telling me

Read full topic
